level.text: 600.1 This chapter shall apply to every resident of a District of Columbiaorrection institution who is serving a sentence for a misdemeanor pursuant toection 3b of An Act To establish a Board of Indeterminate Sentence and Paroleor the District of Columbia and to determine its functions, and for otherurposes, approved July 15, 1932 (47 Stat. 697; D.C. Official Code §4-403.02). This chapter shall not apply to those sentenced to imprisonment for felony pursuant to section 3 or section 3a of An Act To establish a Board ofndeterminate Sentence and Parole for the District of Columbia and to determinets function, and for other purposes, approved July 15, 1932 (47 Stat. 697; D.C.fficial Code §§ 24-403 and 24-403.01).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1077 (February 19, 1988); amendedy District of Columbia Good Time Credits Amendment Act of 2010, effective May7, 2011 (D.C. Law 18-372), published at 58 DCR 7 (January 7, 2011).
